definition: to take unfair advantage of/to deceive/to cheat
to cheat/to swindle/to pretend/to feign/to draw sb out/to try to extract information by deceit or bluff

sentences.english: Trade on the net, most those who make a person afraid is con.
sentences.chinese: 網上交易，最讓人擔心的是欺詐。

sentences.english: "This is fraudulent accounting, " said Melanie Coath, climate change officer at RSPB.
So the call about John’s untimely death was a fraud.
sentences.chinese: 這則關於約翰過早死亡的報道是欺詐新聞。
執行一些欺詐覈查分析。

sentences.english: The people were charged with mortgage-related misrepresentations and other criminal abuses. The F. B.
sentences.chinese: 這些人被控告抵押相關的欺詐和其它犯罪性質的濫用。

sentences.english: Your account was initially thought to be involved in carder activity .
sentences.chinese: 最初我們認爲你的賬戶涉嫌信用卡欺詐。

sentences.english: No right of action can have its origin in fraud.
Yeah. I am interested in, I was interested in how different companies committed fraud
sentences.chinese: 好的。我感興趣的是，公司如何犯下欺詐罪行，

sentences.english: Knavery may serve but honesty is best.
sentences.chinese: 欺詐可能有用，老實卻是上策。

sentences.english: that woman is wanted in 5 states for credit-card fraud.
sentences.chinese: 那位婦女因信用卡欺詐而被5個州通緝。

sentences.english: Client involves Dandy directly or indirectly in any type of fraud.
sentences.chinese: 客戶利用丹迪直接或間接參與在任何類型的欺詐。

sentences.english: Knavery may serve, but honesty is best.
sentences.chinese: 欺詐也許有用，但誠實卻是上策。

sentences.english: If fraud is detected, it will be spotted almost instantly.
sentences.chinese: 如果發現有欺詐，就可以馬上辨別出來。

sentences.english: The peanut industry also condemned the company, portraying it as a rogue operator.
sentences.chinese: 花生工業界也譴責這個公司不道德的欺詐的經營操作。

sentences.english: Favour is deceitful, and beauty is vain.
sentences.chinese: 寵愛是欺詐的，美麗是空虛的。

sentences.english: She served a year in jail for her role in a fraudulent Enron tax return.
sentences.chinese: 她因爲安然稅收欺詐案被判入獄1年。

definition: complaint/to complain/to register a complaint (esp. as a customer)
